players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't get eliminated unexpectedly."
Bob: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's try to stay alert and keep an eye on each other to ensure our safety."
You: "I support Diana's suggestion to keep an eye on each other and ensure our safety. Let's work together as a team to identify any suspicious behavior and avoid unnecessary risks."

Bob: "Based on the events of last night and Diana's theory, I suggest we all share our actions during the night to help us identify any potential threats. This will also allow us to build trust within our team."

You: "I believe it's important that we all share our actions during the night to help build trust within our team and ensure everyone's safety. I did not visit anyone last night, as I wanted to focus on gathering more information about the mafia's potential targets."

Diana: "I'd like to clarify that I did not visit anyone during the night, as I wanted to focus on gathering more information about the mafia's potential targets. I believe it's important for us to work together and share our actions to build trust within our team."
